text: More than 4 in 10 of pastors of churches with smaller congregations have a biblical worldview.
speaker: SPEAKER_05

text: By contrast, only 15% of pastors in churches with more than 250 adults have a biblical worldview.
speaker: SPEAKER_05

text: Church Barn explained that pastors who fill the position of teaching pastor or executive pastor usually have the lowest scores.
speaker: SPEAKER_05

text: These positions are found most often in larger churches.
speaker: SPEAKER_05

text: His survey breaks down pastors according to denomination, according to church size, and according to congregational ethnicity.
speaker: SPEAKER_05

text: None of the percentages are encouraging and a reminder that we need to be discerning when choosing a church.
